duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the ongoing maintenance operations and processes of all building systems, equipment, and facilities to ensure functionality, safety, and regulatory compliance.
Initiate and maintain sanitation program for the facility.
Assign maintenance projects and direct their completion within the building or property.
Establish and complete preventative maintenance schedules for all systems, equipment, and buildings.
Prepares departmental profit plan and related budget.
Monitor and report on third-party pest control provider's services.
Ensure compliance with food safety policies and procedures.
Partner with vendors to ensure safety and security measures are implemented effectively.
Administer corrective action to address negative colleague behaviors when appropriate.
Provide ongoing feedback on colleague performance and the department by monitoring activities and reports.
